payment-detail-des: A place to display the results and details of the customer's payment order
payment-wait: This may take a few seconds, please don't close this page.
name: Name
transaction-number-des: Transaction code on the payment gateway
congratulation-des: Your online ticket purchase has been successful. NHCinema sincerely thanks you for choosing us to meet your entertainment needs. Please see the booking information below.
unfortunate-des: NHCinema would like to inform you that your transaction cannot be completed. Please check your payment information and try again later. Your ticket order will be cancelled after 5 minutes if not paid. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and thank you for your interest in our services.
